Section1Teasers.TeaserTitle: Atradius is the spirit of connectivity
Section1Teasers.APIBody: We aim to make handling your Atradius credit insurance policy a pleasant experience and your business processes more efficient by investing in new connnectivity technologies.

Heading: Creating new ways of working with you
Body:
Connectivity is an important element of Atradius’ strategy to create new ways of working with our customers.

This new connectivity offering is designed with the latest technology to provide all the information you need in one place and to be easy to understand, making the process of connecting simple and cost effective.
ï¿½

Connectivity means you can spend less time on administrative tasks and have the comfort that you have complied with the policy - all through a simple connection.

Section4Teasers.APIBody: See how easy it is to register in the Atradius API developer portal.
